The total lockdown will be lifted with effect from Sunday, June 21, starting at 5:00 AMCompanies and organizations can again maintain their normal opening hours; taking into account the social distances, wash hands and wear mouth and nose cover. Of course, taking into account that everyone is home at 8 p.m. The following sectors will remain closed to the public, namely: hotels, casinos, places of worship, covered vegetable, fruit, meat and fish markets, brothels and barsIndoor gyms remain closed.
